records.description: Slot for connecting the dataset to its records

COHRA2Record.description: A record in the COHRA2 dataset

DF01.description: Has fear of dental work ever caused you to put off making an appointment?

DF02.description: Has fear of dental work ever caused you to cancel or not appear for an appointment?

DF03.description: When having dental work done, my muscles become tense.

DF04.description: When having dental work done, my breathing rate increases.

DF05.description: When having dental work done, I perspire.

DF06.description: When having dental work done, I feel nauseated and sick to my stomach.

DF07.description: When having dental work done, my heart beats faster.

DF08.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Making an appointment for dentistry.

DF09.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Approching the dentist's office.

DF10.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Sitting in the waiting room.

DF11.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Being seated in the dental chair.

DF12.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: The smell of the dentist's office.

DF13.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Seeing the dentist walk in.

DF14.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Seeing the anesthetic needle.

DF15.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Feeling the needle injected.

DF16.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Seeing the drill.

DF17.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Hearing the drill.

DF18.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Feeling the vibrations of the drill.

DF19.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: Having your teeth cleaned.

DF20.description: Please rate how much fear, anxiety, or unpleasantness each of these dental situations causes you: All things considered, how fearful are you of having dental work done?

DF21.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Breaking your arm.

DF22.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Having a foot doctor remove a wart from your foot with a sharp instrument.

DF23.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Getting a paper cut on your finger.

DF24.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Receiving an injection in your mouth.

DF25.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Getting strong soap in both your eyes while bathing or showering.

DF26.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Having someone slam a heavy car door on your hand.

DF27.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Gulping a hot drink before it has cooled.

DF28.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Receiving an injection in your hip/buttocks.

DF29.description: Choose the appropriate number for each item to rate your FEAR OF PAIN in relation to each event: Falling down a flight of concrete stairs.

day.description: The day of the month in which the assessment was given.

month.description: The month in which the assessement was given.

site_code.description: The code for the site where the assessment was given.

year.description: The year in which the assessment was given.
